Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”

Reviews.Content: nights stay london cheap tight budget hotel wasnt expecting double shower toilet clean breakfast ok cereal toast juice basic moneys tight fine couple nights location ok shepherds bush underground nearest tube 5 min walk hotel lick paint carpets furniture bit pleasant stay
